           Haiku 4.5 · Claude API
  ▘▘ ▝▝    /…/var/folders/t5/6tq8cxtj20z035rv8hsnzwvh0000gn/T/capture-B241QL

  /model to try Opus 4.5

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
❯ Try "how does <filepath> work?"
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  ! for bash mode      double tap esc to clear input  ctrl + shift + - to
  / for commands       shift + tab to auto-accept     undo
  @ for file paths     edits                          ctrl + z to suspend
  & for background     ctrl + o for verbose output    ctrl + v to paste
                       ctrl + t to show todos         images
                       shift + ⏎ for newline          meta + p to switch
                                                      model
                                                      ctrl + s to stash
                                                      prompt
                                                      ctrl + g to edit in
                                                      $EDITOR
                                                      /keybindings to
                                                      customize
